comments.author: AquaInfinity AJ

comments.text:
One of my teachers was especially strict about phones in the class room. 
One day, there was the *ding* that Siri makes before talking, and everyone 
stopped to see whose phone it was. All of a sudden, there was rapid German 
coming from the middle of the room, and our host student's eyes were huge. 
The teacher just laughed, and asked what Siri said. Apparently she had 
asked if he wanted to call his mom. That was the only time no one got in 
trouble for a phone accidently going off.﻿
